snippet: Andy Statman, considered a musical visionary for his ability to traverse genres and defy rules, has been able to square his circle of religion and music by tracing klezmer back to Hasidic melodies.
abstract: Samuel G Freedman On Religion column about Andy Statman, who is considered a musical visionary for his ability to traverse genres and defy rules; he has been able to square his circle of religion and music by tracing klezmer back to Hasidic melodies.
lead_paragraph: Andy Statman, considered a musical visionary for his ability to traverse genres and defy rules, has been able to square his circle of religion and music by tracing klezmer back to Hasidic melodies.
